website_summaries.verdict: The Puma EvoPower Vigor 4 Graphic Turf makes an impression with its bright and bold colorways. Those who tried this soccer cleat first-hand attest to its impeccable quality and excellent comfort. Players with wide feet love that it has a broader width compared to other firm ground models. However, some were quick to spot the slight sizing issue, mentioning that this soccer cleat fits smaller than usual. Then again, with its rather economical price range, this soccer cleat remains to be a hit among fans.
pros: The Puma EvoPower Vigor 4 Graphic Turf offers excellent quality, as observed by a majority of wearers
Many testers loved the color options for these soccer cleats
These soccer cleats were comfortable from day one, said a player who tried it out
A good number of users were happy that these turf cleats accommodate wide feet, similar to the Puma Future 18.1 Netfit FG/AG
cons: As what a few reviewers observed, this soccer cleat fits narrow around the toes
A particular wearer reported getting blisters after wearing these cleats for a couple of times

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and good enough for my wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and good enough for my wide feet. The more I play the more they will stretch . Thanks
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Love this boot
customer_reviews.text: Love this boot. Always have loved the power series since the powercats all the way now to the evopower. Not sure if they're planning on ending this model. I hope not. Great texture on top for enhanced ball control and nice grip on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I live in Arizona so I play outdoor with these cleats. Love them. There wasn't even a break-in period, they were comfortable from day 1.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Steiner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Puma is always a little small, 6 Puma = 5.5 Others.
customer_reviews.author: Gian Carlos Lo Prete

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I liked the color it was indeed pretty, but way too small. Got it for 19.98, want to return
customer_reviews.author: Trudy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I play at least once a week on turf. This pair of shoes fit perfectly (size 8.5). For the longest time, I have been looking for a brand the was both economical and fit my wide feet. Puma fit me the best. The feel of the shoe is great. It is very light and I am able to control the ball really well. I don't really see a down side to this shoe yet. I will probably buy this shoe again. Lets see how long this pair lasts me.
customer_reviews.author: Galib Haswarey

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got them!
customer_reviews.text: Size was accurate, worked great on the indoor turf. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good shoe and as discribed but a bit large in size
customer_reviews.author: Ghassan

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable! Like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 12.5 in regular cleats, so I got these the same size. When I tried them on at first they were a bit tight(narrow), but once I hit the field they felt great! They adjusted to my feet and now they fit perfect. No more blisters on hot days! I will definitely buy a second pair when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Bri P.

customer_reviews.title: Runs SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed because I ordered these based on comments here that they run true to size. They are a full size small. I ordered size 14, and these are as small or smaller than a size 13 shoe. I cannot even just wear them and deal with them being a little snug, I have to scrunch my toes. Thanks for lousy sizing, Puma. Seems like by 2017 we should have been able to figure out standardizing shoe sizing...
customer_reviews.author: Z. Pag

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe though, but had to return them cuz alitlle tight
customer_reviews.author: Joe Stock

product_meta.title: Puma Men's Evopower Vigor 4 Graphic Tt Soccer Shoe
product_meta.description: The evopower vigor 4 is an entry price football boot that follows closely the design language of the evopower vigor 1. The evopower vigor 4 combines lightweight, comfort and longevity by using a soft yet highly durable synthetic upper material. The stud configuration offers an optimal mix between stability and agility.
